languages.text: {n}Были это матерые, все видавшие ветераны, готовые рискнуть жизнью в обмен на неприлично огромные вознаграждения, обещанные их близким и повелителям.{/n}
{n}Those were hardened veterans, willing to risk their own lives in exchange for the obscenely large payments promised to their loved ones and masters.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Были это матерые, все видавшие ветераны, готовые рискнуть жизнью в обмен на неприлично огромные вознаграждения, обещанные их близким и повелителям.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些灵能者都是久经历练的老手。他们甘愿冒着生命危险，为他们的挚爱之人与主人换取丰厚的报酬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those were hardened veterans, willing to risk their own lives in exchange for the obscenely large payments promised to their loved ones and masters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些灵能者都是久经历练的老手。他们甘愿冒着生命危险，为他们的挚爱之人与主人换取丰厚的报酬。{/n}
{n}这些灵能者都是久经历练的老手。他们甘愿冒着生命危险，为他们的挚爱之人与主人换取丰厚的报酬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eran veteranos curtidos, dispuestos a arriesgar sus propias vidas a cambio de las gigantescas recompensas prometidas a sus seres queridos y amos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those were hardened veterans, willing to risk their own lives in exchange for the obscenely large payments promised to their loved ones and masters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eran veteranos curtidos, dispuestos a arriesgar sus propias vidas a cambio de las gigantescas recompensas prometidas a sus seres queridos y amos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}それらの者は、愛する者やマスターに約束されたとてつもなく莫大な報酬と引き換えるなら、己の命を危険にさらすことを厭わない歴戦の勇士たちだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those were hardened veterans, willing to risk their own lives in exchange for the obscenely large payments promised to their loved ones and masters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}それらの者は、愛する者やマスターに約束されたとてつもなく莫大な報酬と引き換えるなら、己の命を危険にさらすことを厭わないハーデンド・ベテランだった。{/n}
{n}それらの者は、愛する者やマスターに約束されたとてつもなく莫大な報酬と引き換えるなら、己の命を危険にさらすことを厭わないハーデンド・ベテランだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il s'agit de vétérans aguerris, prêts à risquer leur vie pour obtenir les paiements indécents promis à leurs proches et à leurs maîtres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those were hardened veterans, willing to risk their own lives in exchange for the obscenely large payments promised to their loved ones and masters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il s'agit de vétérans aguerris, prêts à risquer leur vie pour obtenir les paiements indécents promis à leurs proches et à leurs maîtres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es handelte sich um abgehärtete Veteranen, die bereit waren, ihr Leben zu riskieren, weil man ihren Familien und Herren eine obszön hohe Bezahlung versprach.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those were hardened veterans, willing to risk their own lives in exchange for the obscenely large payments promised to their loved ones and masters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es handelte sich um abgehärtete Veteranen, die bereit waren, ihr Leben zu riskieren, weil man ihren Familien und Herren eine obszön hohe Bezahlung versprach.{/n}
{n}Es handelte sich um abgehärtete Veteranen, die bereit waren, ihr Leben zu riskieren — denn man hatte ihrer Familie und ihren Herren obszön großzügige Belohnungen versprochen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bunlar, yürekleri kaskatı olmuş gazilerdi. Sevdiklerine ve efendilerine söz verilen abartılı derecede büyük bedeller karşılığında kendi hayatlarını tehlikeye atmaya razıydılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those were hardened veterans, willing to risk their own lives in exchange for the obscenely large payments promised to their loved ones and masters.{/n}
